main.docTitle: Land (Compulsory Sale for Redevelopment) (Specification of Lower Percentage) Notice

section.name: s2
section.heading: Interpretation
section.def: designated area (指定地區) means an area set out in the Schedule; (25 of 2024 s. 16)

def.name: IndustrialBuilding
def.leadIn: industrial building (工業建築物) means a building the whole or any part of which is approved by the Building Authority for any of the following uses under a plan approved under the Buildings Ordinance (Cap. 123)—

paragraph.name: b

section.def: industrial zone (工業地帶) means a zone that is set apart for industrial use in a draft plan prepared by the Town Planning Board under the Town Planning Ordinance (Cap. 131) or an approved plan or partly approved plan under that Ordinance; (25 of 2023 s. 120)
unit (單位) means any premises that are described by reference to a specified number of undivided shares in a lot in any instrument registered in the Land Registry.

subsection.content: 80% is specified as the percentage required for the purposes of section 3(1) of the Ordinance in respect of a lot that belongs to a class of lots specified in section 4(1). (25 of 2024 s. 17)
70% is specified as the percentage required for the purposes of section 3(1) of the Ordinance in respect of a lot that belongs to a class of lots specified in section 4(2). (25 of 2024 s. 17)
65% is specified as the percentage required for the purposes of section 3(1) of the Ordinance in respect of a lot that belongs to a class of lots specified in section 4(3). (25 of 2024 s. 17)

subsection.leadIn: For the purposes of section 3(1), the class of lots is—

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.content: a lot with each of the units on the lot representing more than 10% of all the undivided shares in the lot; or

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.content: a lot that is not located within a designated area, and with each of the buildings erected on the lot issued with an occupation permit at least 50 years but less than 60 years before the relevant date.

subsection.leadIn: For the purposes of section 3(2), the class of lots is—

paragraph.name: a
b
paragraph.content: a lot that is not located within a designated area, and with each of the buildings erected on the lot issued with an occupation permit at least 60 years but less than 70 years before the relevant date; or

paragraph.name: c
paragraph.leadIn: a lot that is not located within an industrial zone, and each of the buildings erected on the lot—

subparagraph.content: was issued with an occupation permit at least 30 years before the relevant date.

subsection.leadIn: For the purposes of section 3(3), the class of lots is—

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.content: a lot that is located within a designated area, and with each of the buildings erected on the lot issued with an occupation permit at least 60 years but less than 70 years before the relevant date; or

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.content: a lot with each of the buildings erected on the lot issued with an occupation permit at least 70 years before the relevant date.

subsection.leadIn: For the purposes of the class of lots referred to in subsection (1)(a)—

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.leadIn: if a unit in a building is subdivided into 2 or more units on or after 1 April 2010, and the subdivision does not involve—

subparagraph.content: any alteration to the size of any common area of the building; or
any change in a person’s liability in relation to the common areas and facilities of the building under the common law or any enactment,

paragraph.continued: those units are to be regarded as one single unit; and

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.leadIn: if 2 or more units in a building are amalgamated into one single unit on or after the specified date, and the amalgamation does not involve—

subparagraph.content: any alteration to the size of any common area of the building; or
any change in a person’s liability in relation to the common areas and facilities of the building under the common law or any enactment,

paragraph.continued: those units being amalgamated are to be regarded as separate units.

subsection.def: specified date (指明日期) means the date on which the Land (Compulsory Sale for Redevelopment) (Amendment) Ordinance 2024 (25 of 2024) comes into operation*.

section.heading: Amendment of Schedule
